document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Cite-checked omnibus MOL 
Date: Fri, 26 Feb 2021 16:04:05 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.02.26_GM_Omnibus_Opposition_to_Defense_Motions.rd.docx 
Team, truly excellent work on this. and I split up our review, so I took pages 3-116 of the motion 
sections), ands reviewing the rest. Two items to note â€” I tried to change subsequent cites to string cites where 
caught them, but I wasn't reviewing closely for that, so make sure the paras are reviewing for that. Second, as I discussed 
with-please take a look at the redactions in her section. I tried to conform them to the general principal that 
redactions should apply to the subpoena and the ex parte proceeding, and un-redactions should apply to the description 
of the article, her brief making general allegations, and our indictment. If that's not how you are envisioning the 
redactions, happy to discuss. 
Again, fantastic work. This is a very strong brief. 
From: 
Sent: Frida , Februar 26, 2021 4:08 AM 
To 
Cc 
Subject: Cite-checked omnibus M0L 
Attached please find the cite-checked omnibus memorandum of law in opposition to Maxwell's motions. The team will be 
working with the paralegals tomorrow to proofread (which will include cleaning up the TOA), get out the discovery that 
we reference in the MOL, and deal with redactions before filing. You'll see that we have highlighted portions that we 
tentatively expect to redact in 
Thanks, 
EFTA00018833
